mapper.select: SELECT dtp.anc_dict_id, dtp.des_dict_id, dtp.path_length, dtp.creater, dtp.create_time, dtp.modifier, dtp.modify_time, dtp.version, dtp.disabled FROM common_dict_tree_path dtp inner JOIN common_dict d ON dtp.anc_dict_id = d.dict_id WHERE dtp.des_dict_id = #{desDictId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT dtp.anc_dict_id, d1.DICT_CODE as ANC_DICT_CODE, d1.DICT_CODE_TEXT as ANC_DICT_CODE_TEXT, dtp.des_dict_id, d2.DICT_CODE as DES_DICT_CODE, d2.DICT_CODE_TEXT as DES_DICT_CODE_TEXT, dtp.path_length, dtp.creater, dtp.create_time, dtp.modifier, dtp.modify_time, dtp.version, dtp.disabled FROM common_dict_tree_path dtp inner JOIN common_dict d1 ON dtp.anc_dict_id = d1.dict_id inner join common_dict d2 ON dtp.des_dict_id = d2.dict_id WHERE dtp.path_length = #{pathLength,jdbcType=INTEGER}
